info.name: Reddit - My ReddEnt Ponies
info.description: Allows you to use the /r/Idliketobeatree emoticons anywhere on reddit.
info.additionalInfo:
Enables the Stony emotes anywhere on reddit!

See this post for a list of the emotes this script enables: http://www.reddit.com/r/Idliketobeatree/comments/lskuz/stonymoticon_guide/
